page.title: 14Our School In Holybourne
page.content:
Our school is a primary school. It was founded by Thomas Andrews in 1719, and we think it's the{oldest} free primary school for{girls and boys in England. It has always been a school ever since it was built in Georgian times.
The name of our school is{Andrew's {Endowed Primary School.} Our school is a church school and the vicar of Holybourne comes once a week to talk to us.
Our school has got five classrooms, but one has been changed into a {Resources Room}as there are now only four classes of children.
We have got a headmaster and three teachers.
